name: Careful Watchers 1.0
description:
This is kind of like a choose your own adventure game/simulation game, but it was supposed to have more features, like inventory, up close investigation look-at, but I wasn't able to get everything done in time, so here is the current version!

Meet the four main characters, AJ, Kurt, Christie, and Moe, and go along with them on their adventures in their small town, Esteredge. Talk with different people, learn different clues, and piece together the answer (through assumption or evidence) for your case.

Submission for 2022 North Carolina Collegiate Game Jam!
